name: Jellyfin Enhanced
overview: Jellyfin Enhanced and Jellyfin Elsewhere for a better Jellyfin experience.
description: A combination of the Jellyfin Enhanced and Jellyfin Elsewhere userscripts, providing a comprehensive set of tweaks and features for Jellyfin.

versions.changelog:
- Update elsewhere.js resource URLs to use jsdelivr CDN
 - Fix quality tags for TV mode
 - Resetting LanguageTagsEnabled in ResetAllUserSettings
 - fix: add 'Remove from Continue Watching' option on right-click
 - Add 4K request support for Jellyseerr integration
 - Add support for Jellyseerr override rules in requests
 - Add tag position fields to default config mapping
 - Improve config page cache and reset descriptions

 - Please add the manifest for 10.11 if you are on 10.11. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json

- Add [Authorize] to Jellyseerr and TMDB endpoints
 - Add check for TMDb link before adding ARR links
 - Enhance README with troubleshooting and error info
 - Add configurable tag cache TTL and cache clear for tags
 - Add language tags overlay with configurable positions for all tags
 - Add caching for file size and audio language lookups
 - Add theme detection and dynamic theming support
 - Refactor reviews processing intervals
 - Improve Continue Watching detection logic
 - Full Blown Release Notes Conversion!

 - Please add the manifest for 10.11 if you are on 10.11. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json

- Add placeholder and info for splash screen URL
 - Fix subtitle styling for Jellyfin 10.11
 - Watchlist from KefinTweaks
 - Add long press for 2x speed playback feature
 - Migrate Settings to Server!
 - Add option to link Jellyseerr site to Jellyseerr results
 - Add 'reviews expanded by default' setting

- Refactor file size and audio language display logic (again!)
 - Refactor reviews.js
 - Restrict genre tag processing to Movie and Series cards
 - Fix HDR10+ regex to match 'hdr10plus' format
 - Show dash placeholder when no audio languages

name: JavaScript Injector
overview: Inject custom javascript(s) to the Jellyfin Web UI
description: Inject custom javascript(s) to the Jellyfin Web UI

versions.changelog: - Fix script path for installations with base url

name: Jellyfin Tweaks
description: Adds useful tweaks to Jellyfin. Based on the original JellyTweaks by gam24.

versions.changelog: - Fix script path for installations with base url
